product_name: REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Quarter Socks - Men's
long_description: Men's REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Quarter Socks regulate heat and moisture, and are a durable choice for the trail or everyday wear. Merino wool is soft, breathable and warm, but not hot. Lightweight cushioning provides added comfort. Stretch nylon provides durability; elastic yarns boost comfort and improve fit. Reinforced heels and toes enhance durability. Arch support band snugs the fit. Seamless toe closures prevent chafing. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Men's REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Quarter Socks regulate heat and moisture, and are a durable choice for the trail or everyday wear.
